thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Brookdale Senior Living Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.08

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Brookdale Senior Living Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.08
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Brookdale Senior Living Inc:
* BROOKDALE ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE $1.17 BILLION VERSUS $1.21 BILLION * Q4 SAME STORE SALES ROSE 0.5 PERCENT * BROOKDALE SENIOR LIVING - QTRLY NET INCOME INCLUDED $64.0 MILLION DEFERRED INCOME TAX BENEFIT, WHICH INCLUDED IMPACT OF TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT
* AVERAGE OCCUPANCY INCREASED 40 BASIS POINTS SEQUENTIALLY FROM Q3 TO Q4 TO 85.2 PERCENT
* REVENUE PER OCCUPIED UNIT (REVPOR) INCREASED 3.1% IN Q4 COMPARED TO PRIOR YEAR QUARTER
* BROOKDALE SENIOR LIVING - QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.08
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $1.15 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
